flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Montero is traveling a total distance of 600 miles + 600 miles = <<600+600=12000>>12000 miles.
There are 12000 miles / 400 miles = <<12000/400=30>>30 sets of 400 miles in 12000 miles.
So Mr. Montero needs 20 gallons/set x 30 sets = <<20*30=600>>600 gallons in all.
Since his car has 8 gallons already, then he needs to add 600 gallons - 8 gallons = <<600-8=592>>592 gallons more.
#### 592

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
